MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW4 postcode area of Goostrey affecting properties in Main Road.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties at 12:30 pm and we expect the power to be restored by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:50am on 16th December 2020.
